attributes.action: Request the future intensions of CCFC owners regarding the club
attributes.additional_details:
In 2013 the club was moved to Northampton by SISU following a row with the then Ricoh owners and in the same year was put into administration.
The FL gave ownership back to Otium a trading arm of SISU and in 2014 following fan pressure the club was moved back to the Ricoh now under new ownership.
In 2016 negotiations into extending the lease on the Ricoh with the new owners collapsed following a row with the stadium owners. Fans fear that the club will be moved out of the city again.
attributes.background: The fans of the club request that the RT Hon Karen Bradley, Secretary of State for sport instructs the football league and Coventry football club owners SISU to make transparent to the clubs fans the future intentions of the location of the club when the current Ricoh lease expires in 2018.
